name: Catgirl Magic: Furry Duel
description:
t's not easy to study at Catwarts Academy! Magic dueling in pubic is a common thing here. Those who lose pay not with their lives, but with their honour! One little mistake - and your opponent's precise spell removes an item of your clothing, and when there is nothing else to remove, you can only giggle shamefacedly in front of a students crowd...



Yet, many young witches dream of studying in Catwarts. The diploma of this academy is very appreciated in their profession, and the specialization of Catwarts is soooo nice - everyone likes to train magic cats!



You were also invited to study in Сatwarts. Your first duel is coming soon - it's high time to check if your cat army is ready to fight and... put on beautiful clothes. Who knows if you will be able to win this duel
